trans-unit.source: The answer lies in the sRGB to linear conversion that is performed implicitly for color properties of DefaultMaterial, PrincipledMaterial, and also for custom properties with a color type in a CustomMaterial. Such conversion is not performed for any other value, so if the shader hardcodes a color value, or bases it on a QML property with a type different from color, it will be up to the shader to perform linearization in case the source value was in sRGB color space. Converting to linear is important since Qt Quick 3D performs tonemapping on the results of fragment shading, and that process assumes values in the sRGB space as its input.
trans-unit.target: 答案在于sRGB到线性转换，该转换对DefaultMaterial，PrincipledMaterial的颜色属性以及CustomMaterial中具有 color 类型的自定义属性隐式执行。不会对任何其他值执行这种转换，因此，如果着色器对颜色值进行硬编码，或将其基于具有与 color 不同类型的QML属性，则在源值位于其中的情况下，由着色器执行线性化sRGB色彩空间。转换为线性很重要，因为Qt Quick 3D会对片段阴影的结果执行色调映射，并且该过程将sRGB空间中的值作为其输入。

trans-unit.source: The application developer is likely to have the best understanding of when an application is going to be idle for substantial periods of time. If a QML application uses a lot of JavaScript heap memory, causing regular and disruptive garbage collection cycles during particularly performance-sensitive tasks (for example, list scrolling, animations, and so forth), the application developer may be well served to manually invoke the garbage collector during periods of zero activity. Idle periods are ideal for performing garbage collection since the user will not notice any degradation of user experience (skipped frames, jerky animations, and so on) which would result from invoking the garbage collector while activity is occurring.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序开发人员可能最了解应用程序何时会有相当长的时间处于空闲状态。如果一个QML应用程序使用了大量的JavaScript堆内存,在对性能特别敏感的任务(例如,列表滚动、动画等等)中造成了经常性的、破坏性的垃圾收集周期,那么应用程序开发者最好在零活动期间手动调用垃圾收集器。闲置期是执行垃圾收集的理想时期,因为用户不会注意到任何用户体验的降低(跳过的帧、抖动的动画等等),而这将导致在活动发生时调用垃圾收集器。

trans-unit.source: The application first creates an instance of QXmlQuery and calls setQuery() to read queryFile containing the XQuery we want to run. Then it creates an instance of our custom node model class, ChemistryNodeModel, which is a subclass of QAbstractXmlNodeModel. Its constructor is called with the name pool obtained from our QXmlQuery, and with the chemistryFile containing the structure of molecules and atoms to be queried. The name pool is required because our custom node model has the member function name(), which returns the name of any node in the model. The query and the custom node model must use the same name pool for constructing these names. The constructor would then read chemistryFile and build the custom node model structure.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序首先创建QXmlQuery的实例，然后调用setQuery（）来读取包含我们要运行的XQuery的 queryFile 。然后，它创建我们的自定义节点模型类的实例 ChemistryNodeModel ，该类是QAbstractXmlNodeModel的子类。使用从我们的QXmlQuery获得的名称池以及包含要查询的分子和原子的结构的 chemistryFile 来调用其构造函数。该名池是必需的，因为我们的自定义节点模型成员函数名（） ，它返回名称模型中任何节点的数量。该查询和自定义节点模型必须使用相同的名称池构建这些名字。然后，构造函数将读取 chemistryFile 并构建自定义节点模型结构。

Its constructor is called with the name pool obtained from our QXmlQuery, and with the chemistryFile containing the structure of molecules and atoms to be queried. The name pool is required because our custom node model has the member function name(), which returns the name of any node in the model. The query and the custom node model must use the same name pool for constructing these names. The constructor would then read chemistryFile and build the custom node model structure.

trans-unit.source: The ascent of a font is the distance from the baseline to the highest position characters extend to. In practice, some font designers break this rule, e.g. when they put more than one accent on top of a character, or to accommodate an unusual character in an exotic language, so it is possible (though rare) that this value will be too small.
trans-unit.target: 字体的上升幅度是指从基线到字符延伸到最高位置的距离。在实践中,一些字体设计者打破了这一规则,例如,当他们在一个字符的顶部放置一个以上的重音时,或者为了适应一种外来语言中的特殊字符,因此,这个值可能会太小(虽然很少)。

trans-unit.source: The astute reader will have noticed that this use of string-length() to find an empty element is unreliable. It works in this case, because the method element is written as <method/>, guaranteeing that its string length will be 0. It will still work if the method element is written as <method></method>, but it will fail if there is any whitespace between the opening and ending <method> tags. A more robust way to find the recipes with empty methods is presented in the section on Boolean Predicates.
trans-unit.target: 精明的读者会注意到，使用 string-length() 查找空元素是不可靠的。在这种情况下它可以工作，因为method元素写为 <method/> ，保证了它的字符串长度为0。如果method元素写成 <method></method> ，它仍然可以工作，但是会失败在开始和结束 <method> 标记之间是否有空格。在布尔谓词部分中介绍了一种使用空方法查找配方的更可靠的方法。

trans-unit.source: The astute reader will have noticed that this use of string-length() to find an empty element is unreliable. It will still work if the method element is written as <method></method>, but it will fail if there is any whitespace between the opening and ending <method> tags. A more robust way to find the recipes with empty methods is presented in the section on Boolean Predicates.

trans-unit.source: The attached object is also valid inside Window or Window derived types, after component completion. In that case it refers to the screen where the Window was created. It is generally better to access the Screen from the relevant Item instead, because on a multi-screen desktop computer, the user can drag a Window into a position where it spans across multiple screens. In that case some Items will be on one screen, and others on a different screen.
trans-unit.target: 在组件完成后,附加的对象在Window或Window派生类型中也是有效的。在这种情况下,它指的是创建窗口的屏幕。一般来说,最好从相关的Item来访问屏幕,因为在多屏桌面计算机上,用户可以将一个窗口拖到一个跨越多个屏幕的位置。在这种情况下,一些项目将在一个屏幕上,而其他项目则在不同的屏幕上。

trans-unit.source: The attached property LayoutMirroring is provided as a convenience for easily implementing right-to-left support for existing left-to-right Qt Quick applications. It mirrors the behavior of Item anchors, the layout direction of positioners and model views, and the explicit text alignment of QML text types.
trans-unit.target: 提供附件属性LayoutMirroring是为了方便地为现有的从左到右的Qt Quick应用程序实现从右到左的支持。它反映了项目锚点的行为，定位器和模型视图的布局方向以及QML文本类型的显式文本对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The attached property LayoutMirroring is provided as a convenience for easily implementing right-to-left support for existing left-to-right Qt Quick applications. It mirrors the behavior of Item anchors, the layout direction of positioners and model views, and the explicit text alignment of QML text types.
trans-unit.target: 提供附件属性LayoutMirroring是为了方便地为现有的从左到右的Qt Quick应用程序实现从右到左的支持。它反映了项目锚点的行为，定位器和模型视图的布局方向以及QML文本类型的显式文本对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The availability of gamepad devices is monitored via libudev, assuming Qt was built with libudev support enabled. This means that connecting wired gamepads or wireless dongles is possible also while an application is running.
trans-unit.target: 假设Qt是在启用libudev支持的情况下构建的，则通过 libudev 监视游戏手柄设备的可用性。这意味着在运行应用程序时也可以连接有线游戏手柄或无线加密狗。

trans-unit.source: The availability of the result can be checked with isResultAvailable(). The result can be fetched with waitForResult() which will block if the result is not yet available.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用isResultAvailable（）检查结果的可用性。可以使用waitForResult（）获取结果，如果结果尚不可用，它将阻塞。

trans-unit.source: The available fill patterns are described by the Qt::BrushStyle enum. These include basic patterns spanning from uniform color to very sparse pattern, various line combinations, gradient fills and textures. Qt provides the QGradient class to define custom gradient fills, while texture patterns are specified using the QPixmap class.

trans-unit.source: The axes specific to the series can be later obtained from the chart by providing the series as the parameter for the axes() function call. QPieSeries does not create any axes.
trans-unit.target: 通过将序列提供为axis（）函数调用的参数，以后可以从图表中获得特定于序列的轴。QPieSeries不创建任何轴。

trans-unit.source: The axis formatter to be used. Any existing formatter is deleted when a new formatter is set.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的轴格式。当设置新的格式时,任何现有的格式都会被删除。

trans-unit.source: The axis to rotate around. For simple (2D) rotation around a point, you do not need to specify an axis, as the default axis is the z axis (axis { x: 0; y: 0; z: 1 }).
trans-unit.target: 绕轴旋转。对于围绕点的简单（2D）旋转，您无需指定轴，因为默认轴为z轴（ axis { x: 0; y: 0; z: 1 } ）。

trans-unit.source: The axis used by this Logical Device
trans-unit.target: 该逻辑设备使用的轴

trans-unit.target: 到真北的方位角,以度为单位。

trans-unit.source: The backend is free to choose what the parameter key and values are, however if a backend only ever has one URL per icon it is recommended that the QPlaceIcon::SingleUrl be used as the key.
trans-unit.target: 后端可以自由选择参数键和值，但是，如果后端每个图标只有一个URL，则建议将QPlaceIcon :: SingleUrl用作键。

trans-unit.source: The backend needs to be connected, otherwise false will be returned. Calling connectToBackend() or start() will create a connection to the backend.
trans-unit.target: 后端需要连接，否则将返回false。调用connectToBackend（）或start（）将创建到后端的连接。

trans-unit.source: The backend provides the pressure sensor's die temperature
trans-unit.target: 后台提供压力传感器的模温。

trans-unit.source: The backend should expect and correctly handle frequent zoomTo() calls during zoom animations or slider movements.
trans-unit.target: 后台应该期望并正确处理在缩放动画或滑块移动期间频繁的zoomTo()调用。

trans-unit.source: The backend specifies its field of view, which can be read from the QLightSensor::fieldOfView property.
trans-unit.target: 后端指定其视野，可以从QLightSensor :: fieldOfView属性读取。

trans-unit.source: The backend supports buffering of readings, controlled by the QSensor::bufferSize property.
trans-unit.target: 后端支持由QSensor :: bufferSize属性控制的读数缓冲。

trans-unit.source: The backend supports changing the axes orientation from the default of QSensor::FixedOrientation to something else.
trans-unit.target: 后端支持将轴方向从默认的QSensor :: FixedOrientation更改为其他方向。

trans-unit.source: The backend supports changing the policy on whether to suspend when idle, controlled by the QSensor::alwaysOn property.
trans-unit.target: 后端支持更改由QSensor :: alwaysOn属性控制的有关是否在空闲时暂停的策略。

trans-unit.source: The backend supports returning geo values, which can be controlled with the QMagnetometer::returnGeoValues property.
trans-unit.target: 后端支持返回的地理值，可以使用QMagnetometer :: returnGeoValues属性进行控制。

trans-unit.source: The backend supports skipping of same or very similar successive readings. This can be enabled by setting the QSensor::skipDuplicates property to true.
trans-unit.target: 后端支持跳过相同或非常相似的连续读数。可以通过将QSensor :: skipDuplicates属性设置为true 来启用。

trans-unit.source: The backend supports switching the acceleration mode of the acceleromter with the QAccelerometer::accelerationMode property.
trans-unit.target: 后端支持使用QAccelerometer :: accelerationMode属性来切换加速器的加速模式。

trans-unit.source: The backend was unable to synthesize the current string.

trans-unit.target: 作为高性能引擎,我们关注的后端是。

trans-unit.source: The bar thickness ratio between the X and Z dimensions. The value 1.0 means that the bars are as wide as they are deep, whereas 0.5 makes them twice as deep as they are wide.
trans-unit.target: X和Z尺寸之间的钢筋厚度比。值 1.0 意味着该棒是一样宽，因为它们是深的，而 0.5 使得它们的两倍深，因为它们宽。

trans-unit.source: The barrier defines the ordering of memory operations issued by a prior command. This means that if command1 is manipulating a buffer that is to be used as a vertex attribute buffer in a following command2, then the memory barrier should be placed after command1 and setting the appropriate barrier type for vertex attribute buffer.
trans-unit.target: 屏障定义了前面命令发出的内存操作的顺序。也就是说,如果command1操作的是一个缓冲区,而这个缓冲区在后面的command2中要作为顶点属性缓冲区使用,那么内存屏障应该放在command1之后,并为顶点属性缓冲区设置相应的屏障类型。

trans-unit.source: The base Affector does not alter any attributes, but can be used to emit a signal when a particle meets certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 基础Affector不改变任何属性,但可以用来在粒子满足某些条件时发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The base URI for a processing instruction, comment, attribute, or text node is the base URI of the node's parent element.
trans-unit.target: 处理指令、注释、属性或文本节点的基础URI是该节点父元素的基础URI。

trans-unit.source: The base URI of a node can be extracted using the fn:base-uri() function. The base URI is typically used for resolving relative URIs that appear in the node or its children. It is conformant to just return the document URI, although that might not properly reflect the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 fn:base-uri() 函数提取节点的基本URI 。基本URI通常用于解析出现在节点或其子节点中的相对URI。尽管可能无法正确反映基础数据，但仅返回文档URI是一致的。

trans-unit.source: The basic Vulkan resources (physical device, graphics queue, a command pool, the window's main command buffer, image formats, etc.) are exposed on the QVulkanWindow via lightweight getter functions. trans-unit.target: Vulkan的基本资源（物理设备，图形队列，命令池，窗口的主命令缓冲区，图像格式等）通过轻量级的getter函数在QVulkanWindow上公开。其中一些只是为了方便起见，应用程序始终可以直接通过Vulkan API自由查询，创建和管理其他资源。

trans-unit.source: The basic issue is that the user's key strokes can be directed at any of several windows on the screen, and any of several widgets inside the intended window. When the user presses a key, they expect it to go to the right place, and the software must try to meet this expectation. The system must determine which application the key stroke is directed at, which window within that application, and which widget within that window.
trans-unit.target: 基本的问题是,用户的按键可以指向屏幕上的任何一个窗口,以及目标窗口内的任何一个部件。当用户按下一个键时,他们希望它能到正确的地方,而软件必须努力满足这个期望。系统必须确定按键指向的是哪个应用程序,该应用程序中的哪个窗口,以及该窗口中的哪个小组件。

trans-unit.source: The basic structural building blocks in documents are QTextBlock and QTextFrame. Blocks themselves contain fragments of rich text (QTextFragment), but these do not directly influence the high level structure of a document.
trans-unit.target: 文档中的基本结构构建块是QTextBlock和QTextFrame。块本身包含富文本片段（QTextFragment），但是它们并不直接影响文档的高级结构。

trans-unit.source: The basis of skeletal animation is the Skeleton. This is an abstract representation of how the model can move, inspired by how a physical skeleton works for vertebrates. The "bones" of the skeleton is represented by a hierarchy of Joint nodes. These do not necessarily need to represent actual bones, of course.
trans-unit.target: 骨骼动画的基础是骷髅。这是模型的移动方式的抽象表示，受物理骨架如何作用于脊椎动物的启发。该骨架的“骨头”是的层次代表联合节点。当然，这些不一定代表实际的骨骼。

trans-unit.source: The bearing measured in degrees clockwise from true north to the direction of travel.
trans-unit.target: 从真北到行进方向顺时针测量的度数。

trans-unit.source: The bearing of the device in degrees, relative to true north
trans-unit.target: 设备相对于北纬的度数。

trans-unit.source: The bearing returned is the bearing from the origin to
trans-unit.target: 返回的轴承是指从原点到以下地点的轴承。

trans-unit.source: The bearing specifying the angle of approach of the waypoint, that is the bearing with which the waypoint is to be approached. This information may be used by the provider to filter the road segment the waypoint will be placed on, and, depending on the provider and the travel mode used, to restrict the maneuvers allowed at the waypoint, potentially making the provider calculating and returning a different route.
trans-unit.target: 指明航路点接近角的方位角，即要接近航路点的方位角。供应商可以使用此信息来过滤将放置航路点的路段，并根据供应商和所使用的出行方式来限制在航路点允许的操纵，从而可能使供应商计算并返回不同的路段路线。

trans-unit.source: The beauty of the framegraph is that combining these simple node types, it is possible to configure the renderer to suit your specific needs without touching any hairy, low-level C/C++ rendering code at all.
trans-unit.target: framegraph的好处是,结合这些简单的节点类型,可以根据自己的具体需求来配置渲染器,完全不需要接触任何毛躁的、低级的C/C++渲染代码。

trans-unit.source: The beauty of this mechanism is that it works on all platforms supported by Qt and that it still gives you a lot of flexibility, without requiring you to specify any file names or registry paths.
trans-unit.target: 这种机制的好处是,它可以在Qt支持的所有平台上工作,而且它仍然给你很大的灵活性,而不需要你指定任何文件名或注册表路径。

trans-unit.source: The beginning location, in pixels from the upper-left corner of the page, from which to find selected text. trans-unit.source: The behavior of the spin box could be adjusted to make it more user friendly. In the default event filter supplied by QStyledItemDelegate, if the user hits Return to confirm their choice in the spin box, the delegate commits the value to the model and closes the spin box. We can change this behavior by installing our own event filter on the spin box, and provide editing hints that suit our needs; for example, we might emit closeEditor() with the EditNextItem hint to automatically start editing the next item in the view.
trans-unit.target: 可以调整旋转框的行为，以使其更加用户友好。在QStyledItemDelegate提供的默认事件过滤器中，如果用户单击Return确认在旋转框中的选择，则委托将值提交给模型并关闭旋转框。我们可以通过在旋转框上安装我们自己的事件过滤器来更改此行为，并提供适合我们需要的编辑提示。例如，我们可以发出带有EditNextItem提示的closeEditor（）以自动开始编辑视图中的下一个项目。

trans-unit.source: The benefit of compile-time style selection is that the QtQuick.Controls plugin is not used and therefore does not need to be deployed with the application.
trans-unit.target: 编译时样式选择的好处是不使用QtQuick .Controls插件，因此不需要与应用程序一起部署。

trans-unit.source: The benefit of run-time style selection is that a single application binary can support multiple styles, meaning that the end user can choose which style to run the application with.
trans-unit.target: 运行时样式选择的好处是,一个应用程序二进制可以支持多种样式,这意味着最终用户可以选择用哪种样式运行应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The benefit of sharing is that a program does not need to duplicate data unnecessarily, which results in lower memory use and less copying of data. Objects can easily be assigned, sent as function arguments, and returned from functions.
trans-unit.target: 共享的好处是程序不需要重复数据,从而降低了内存使用量,减少了数据的复制。对象可以很容易地被分配,作为函数参数发送,并从函数中返回。

trans-unit.source: The benefit of this model is reduced memory consumption, because more web pages will share processes. The drawbacks include reduced security, robustness, and responsiveness.
trans-unit.target: 这种模式的好处是减少了内存消耗,因为更多的网页会共享进程。缺点包括降低安全性、健壮性和响应性。

trans-unit.source: The binding expression computes the value by reading other QProperty values. Behind the scenes this dependency is tracked. Whenever a change in any property's dependency is detected, the binding expression is re-evaluated and the new result is applied to the property. This happens lazily, by marking the binding as dirty and evaluating it only when the property's value is requested. For example:
trans-unit.target: 绑定表达式通过读取其他QProperty值来计算该值。在幕后对这种依赖性进行跟踪。每当检测到任何属性的依赖性发生变化时,绑定表达式就会被重新评估,并将新的结果应用于该属性。这是通过将绑定标记为dirty,并仅在属性的值被请求时才对其进行评估,从而实现了懒惰地发生。例如

trans-unit.source: The blending operation implemented by this class is:

trans-unit.source: The blending should use the normalized formula; V' = Vbase * (1.0 - sum(Wi)) + sum[Vi * Wi]

trans-unit.source: The bounding region describes a coarse outline of the item's visual contents. Although it's expensive to calculate, it's also more precise than boundingRect(), and it can help to avoid unnecessary repainting when an item is updated. This is particularly efficient for thin items (e.g., lines or simple polygons). You can tune the granularity for the bounding region by calling setBoundingRegionGranularity(). The default granularity is 0; in which the item's bounding region is the same as its bounding rect.
trans-unit.target: 边界区域描述了项目视觉内容的粗略轮廓。尽管计算起来很昂贵，但是它比boundingRect（）更精确，并且可以帮助避免在更新项目时不必要的重新绘制。这对于薄的物品（例如线或简单的多边形）特别有效。您可以通过调用setBoundingRegionGranularity（）来调整边界区域的粒度。默认粒度为0；默认值为0。其中项目的边界区域与其边界矩形相同。

trans-unit.source: The brush color() defines the color of the fill pattern. The color can either be one of Qt's predefined colors, Qt::GlobalColor, or any other custom QColor. The currently set color can be retrieved and altered using the color() and setColor() functions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 笔刷颜色（）定义填充图案的颜色。颜色可以是Qt的预定义颜色之一Qt :: GlobalColor，也可以是任何其他自定义QColor。分别使用color（）和setColor（）函数可以检索和更改当前设置的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The brush style() defines the fill pattern using the Qt::BrushStyle enum. The default brush style is Qt::NoBrush (depending on how you construct a brush). This style tells the painter to not fill shapes. The standard style for filling is Qt::SolidPattern. The style can be set when the brush is created using the appropriate constructor, and in addition the setStyle() function provides means for altering the style once the brush is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 笔刷样式（）使用Qt :: BrushStyle枚举定义填充图案。默认的笔刷样式是Qt :: NoBrush（取决于您如何构造笔刷）。此样式告诉画家不要填充形状。填充的标准样式是Qt :: SolidPattern。可以在使用适当的构造函数创建画笔时设置样式，此外，setStyle（）函数提供了一种在构建画笔后更改样式的方法。

trans-unit.source: The build system needs to run the server executable to generate the interface definition, and to register the server. If a dynamic link library the server links against is not in the path this might fail (e.g. Visual Studio calls the server using the environment settings specified in the "Directories" option). Make sure that all DLLs and plugins required by your server are located in a directory that is listed in the path as printed in the error message box (see also The Windows Deployment Tool).
trans-unit.target: 构建系统需要运行服务器可执行文件以生成接口定义并注册服务器。如果服务器链接的动态链接库不在路径中，则可能会失败（例如，Visual Studio使用“目录”选项中指定的环境设置来调用服务器）。确保服务器所需的所有DLL和插件都位于错误消息框中打印的路径中列出的目录中（另请参阅Windows部署工具）。

trans-unit.source: The build system needs to run the server executable to generate the interface definition, and to register the server. Make sure that all DLLs and plugins required by your server are located in a directory that is listed in the path as printed in the error message box (see also The Windows Deployment Tool).

trans-unit.source: The building of the draw calls for the next frame happens in QVulkanWindowRenderer::startNextFrame(). The implementation is expected to add commands to the command buffer returned from currentCommandBuffer(). Returning from the function does not indicate that the commands are ready for submission. Rather, an explicit call to frameReady() is required. This allows asynchronous generation of commands, possibly on multiple threads. Simple implementations will simply call frameReady() at the end of their QVulkanWindowRenderer::startNextFrame().
trans-unit.target: 下一个帧的绘制调用的构建发生在QVulkanWindowRenderer :: startNextFrame（）中。该实现有望将命令添加到从currentCommandBuffer（）返回的命令缓冲区中。从函数返回并不表示命令已准备好提交。而是需要显式调用frameReady（）。这允许异步生成命令，可能在多个线程上。简单的实现可以简单的叫frameReady在其结束（）QVulkanWindowRenderer :: startNextFrame（）。

trans-unit.source: The building of the draw calls for the next frame happens in QVulkanWindowRenderer::startNextFrame(). The implementation is expected to add commands to the command buffer returned from currentCommandBuffer(). Returning from the function does not indicate that the commands are ready for submission. Rather, an explicit call to frameReady() is required. This allows asynchronous generation of commands, possibly on multiple threads. Simple implementations will simply call frameReady() at the end of their QVulkanWindowRenderer::startNextFrame().
trans-unit.target: 下一个帧的绘制调用的构建发生在QVulkanWindowRenderer :: startNextFrame（）中。该实现有望将命令添加到从currentCommandBuffer（）返回的命令缓冲区中。从函数返回并不表示命令已准备好提交。而是需要显式调用frameReady（）。这允许异步生成命令，可能在多个线程上。简单的实现可以简单的叫frameReady他们QVulkanWindowRenderer结束（）:: startNextFrame（）。

trans-unit.source: The built-in QColor constants, such as, "green", are all given in sRGB space. Therefore, just assigning vec4(0.0, 0.5, 0.0, 1.0) to BASE_COLOR in the first attempt is insufficient if we wanted a result that matches an RGB value (0, 128, 0) in the sRGB space. See the BASE_COLOR documentation in CustomMaterial for a formula for linearizing such color values. The same applies to color values retrieved by sampling textures: if the source image data is not in the sRGB color space, a conversion is needed (unless tonemapping is disabled).
trans-unit.target: 内置的QColor常量（例如 "green" ）均在sRGB空间中给出。因此，如果我们想要一个与sRGB空间中的RGB值 (0, 128, 0) 0，128，0 vec4(0.0, 0.5, 0.0, 1.0) 相匹配的结果，则在第一次尝试中仅将vec4（0.0，0.5，0.0，1.0 ）分配给BASE_COLOR是不够的。有关使这些颜色值线性化的公式，请参见CustomMaterial中的 BASE_COLOR 文档。这同样适用于通过采样纹理获取的颜色值：如果源图像数据不在sRGB颜色空间中，则需要进行转换（除非禁用了色调映射）。

trans-unit.source: The cache associates a pixmap with a user-provided string as a key, or with a QPixmapCache::Key that the cache generates. Using QPixmapCache::Key for keys is faster than using strings. The string API is very convenient for complex keys but the QPixmapCache::Key API will be very efficient and convenient for a one-to-one object-to-pixmap mapping - in this case, you can store the keys as members of an object.
trans-unit.target: 缓存将像素图与用户提供的字符串作为键或缓存生成的QPixmapCache :: Key关联。使用QPixmapCache :: Key作为键比使用字符串更快。字符串API对于复杂的键非常方便，但是QPixmapCache :: Key API对于一对一的对象到像素图映射将非常有效且方便-在这种情况下，您可以将键存储为对象的成员。

trans-unit.source: The cache file is a special file qmake reads to find settings not specified in the qmake.conf file, project files, or at the command line. When qmake is run, it looks for a file called .qmake.cache in parent directories of the current directory, unless you specify -nocache. If qmake fails to find this file, it will silently ignore this step of processing.

trans-unit.source: The call to future.cancel() from the last line causes that the next call to promise.isCanceled() will return true and aFunction will return immediately without any further result reporting.
trans-unit.target: 要将呼叫 future.cancel() 从最后一行会导致在下次调用 promise.isCanceled() 将返回 true 和 aFunction 会立即返回而不进行任何进一步的结果报告。

trans-unit.source: The call to future.suspend() requests the running task to hold its execution. After calling this method, the running task will suspend after the next call to promise.suspendIfRequested() in its iteration loop. In this case the running task will block on a call to promise.suspendIfRequested(). The blocked call will unblock after the future.resume() is called. Note, that internally suspendIfRequested() uses wait condition in order to unblock, so the running thread goes into an idle state instead of wasting its resources when blocked in order to periodically check if the resume request came from the caller's thread.
trans-unit.target: 对 future.suspend() 的调用请求正在运行的任务保持其执行。调用此方法后，正在运行的任务将在其迭代循环中的下一次对 promise.suspendIfRequested() 的调用之后暂停。在这种情况下，正在运行的任务将阻塞对 promise.suspendIfRequested() 的调用。调用 future.resume() 后，被阻止的调用将解除阻止。请注意，内部suspendIfRequested（）内部使用等待条件来解除阻塞，因此正在运行的线程进入空闲状态，而不是在阻塞时浪费其资源，以便定期检查恢复请求是否来自调用者的线程。

trans-unit.source: The camera failed to acquire the requested lock in result of autofocus failure, exposure out of supported range, etc.
trans-unit.target: 由于自动对焦失败、曝光超出支持范围等原因,相机未能获得所需的锁定。

trans-unit.source: The camera focus, exposure or white balance is locked. The camera is ready to capture, application may check the exposure parameters.
trans-unit.target: 相机对焦、曝光或白平衡被锁定。相机已准备好拍摄,应用程序可检查曝光参数。

trans-unit.source: The camera focus, exposure or white balance is locked. The camera is ready to capture, application may check the exposure stays the same, parameters. The Locked status usually means the requested parameter except in the cases when the parameter is requested to be constantly updated. For example, in continuous focusing mode, the focus is considered locked as long as the object is in focus, even while the actual focusing distance may be constantly changing.
trans-unit.target: 相机对焦，曝光或白平衡被锁定。相机已准备好拍摄，应用程序可能会检查曝光保持不变的参数。在 Locked 状态通常是指请求的参数除了在情况下，当请求的参数被不断更新。例如，在连续聚焦模式下，即使实际聚焦距离可能不断变化，只要对象处于聚焦状态，就认为焦点已锁定。

trans-unit.source: The camera focus, exposure, or white balance is locked. The camera is ready to capture, and the application may check the exposure parameters.
trans-unit.target: 相机对焦、曝光或白平衡被锁定。相机已准备好拍摄,应用程序可能会检查曝光参数。

trans-unit.source: The camera focus, exposure, or white balance is locked. The camera is ready to capture, and the application may check the exposure parameters. The locked state usually means the requested parameter stays the same, except in cases where the parameter is requested to be updated constantly. For example, in continuous focusing mode, the focus is considered locked as long as the object is in focus, even while the actual focusing distance may be constantly changing.
trans-unit.target: 相机对焦、曝光或白平衡被锁定。相机已经准备好拍摄,应用程序可以检查曝光参数。锁定状态通常意味着所请求的参数保持不变,除非在请求不断更新参数的情况下。例如,在连续对焦模式下,只要对象在对焦中,即使实际对焦距离可能不断变化,也会被视为锁定。

trans-unit.source: The camera has automatically focused successfully
trans-unit.target: 摄像机已自动对焦成功

trans-unit.source: The camera has been started and can produce data, viewfinder displays video frames.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机已经启动并能产生数据,取景器显示视频帧。

trans-unit.source: The camera has been started and can produce data, viewfinder displays video frames. Depending on backend, changing camera settings such as capture mode, codecs, or resolution in Camera.ActiveState may lead to changing the status to LoadedStatus and StartingStatus while the settings are applied, and back to ActiveStatus when the camera is ready.
trans-unit.target: 相机已启动并且可以产生数据，取景器显示视频帧。根据后端的不同，更改相机设置（例如捕获模式，编解码器或 Camera.ActiveState 中的分辨率）可能会导致在应用设置时将状态更改为 LoadedStatus 和 StartingStatus ，并在相机准备就绪时更改为 ActiveStatus 。

trans-unit.source: The camera has been started and can produce data. The viewfinder displays video frames in active state.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机已经启动,并能产生数据。取景器显示处于活动状态的视频帧。

trans-unit.source: The camera has been started and can produce data. The viewfinder displays video frames in active state. Depending on backend, changing some camera settings like capture mode, codecs or resolution in ActiveState may lead to changing the camera status to LoadedStatus and StartingStatus while the settings are applied and back to ActiveStatus when the camera is ready.
trans-unit.target: 相机已启动，可以产生数据。取景器显示处于活动状态的视频帧。根据后端的不同，在ActiveState中更改某些摄像头设置（例如捕获模式，编解码器或分辨率）可能会导致在应用设置时将摄像头状态更改为LoadedStatus和StartingStatus，并在摄像头准备就绪时将其更改为ActiveStatus。

trans-unit.source: The camera is available for use.

trans-unit.source: The camera is loaded and ready to be configured.

trans-unit.source: The camera is loaded and ready to be configured. In this state it's allowed to query camera capabilities, set capture resolution, codecs, etc. The viewfinder is not active in the loaded state. The camera consumes power in the loaded state.

trans-unit.source: The camera is loaded and ready to be configured. In this state you can query camera capabilities, set capture resolution, codecs, and so on. The viewfinder is not active in the loaded state. The camera consumes power in this state.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机已加载并准备好进行配置。在此状态下,您可以查询摄像机的功能,设置拍摄分辨率、编解码器等。在加载状态下,取景器不活动。在此状态下,摄像机会消耗电能。

trans-unit.source: The camera is loaded and ready to be configured. This status indicates that the camera is opened and it's possible to query for supported image and video capture settings, such as resolution, frame rate, and codecs.

trans-unit.source: The camera is loaded and ready to be configured. This status indicates the camera device is opened and it's possible to query for supported image and video capture settings such as resolution, frame rate, and codecs.

trans-unit.source: The camera is on the front face of the system hardware. For example on a mobile device, it means it is on the same side as that of the screen. trans-unit.source: The categories of a manager engine are relatively static entities; for engines accessing remote place datastores it may be desirable to cache the category structure rather than querying a server every time QPlaceManagerEngine::initializeCategories() is called. Depending on how dynamic the categories are, always downloading the freshest set of categories may be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 管理器引擎的类别是相对静态的实体；对于访问远程位置数据存储区的引擎，可能希望在每次调用QPlaceManagerEngine :: initializeCategories（）时都缓存类别结构，而不是查询服务器。根据类别的动态程度，始终下载最新的类别集可能更合适。

trans-unit.source: The category only has a pointer tool by default, and we have to add the Qt objects we want to use in our form. Right-click on the empty space, and select "Customize". This opens a dialog that has two tabs, "COM Components" and ".NET Framework Components". We used ActiveQt to wrap QWidgets into COM objects, so we select the "COM Components" page, and look for the classes we want to use, e.g. "QPushButton" and "QAxWidget2".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该类别仅具有一个指针工具，我们必须在表单中添加要使用的Qt对象。右键单击空白区域，然后选择“自定义”。这将打开一个具有两个选项卡的对话框，“ COM组件”和“ .NET Framework组件”。我们使用ActiveQt将QWidget包装到COM对象中，因此我们选择“ COM Components”页面，并查找要使用的类，例如“ QPushButton ”和“ QAxWidget2”。

trans-unit.source: The category only has a pointer tool by default, and we have to add the Qt objects we want to use in our form. Right-click on the empty space, and select "Customize". trans-unit.source: The certificate can be rejected by calling rejectCertificate, which will stop loading the web engine request. By default, an invalid certificate will be automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用rejectCertificate拒绝证书，这将停止加载Web引擎请求。默认情况下，无效的证书将被自动拒绝。

trans-unit.source: The certificate claimed DNS names that are in violation of name constraints.
trans-unit.target: 该证书声称的DNS名称违反了名称约束。

trans-unit.source: The certificate contains a weak key.

trans-unit.target: 该证书包含错误。

trans-unit.source: The certificate did not match the built-in public keys pinned for the host name.
trans-unit.target: 证书不符合主机名的内置公钥钉。

trans-unit.source: The certificate error can be handled by using the methods of the WebEngineCertificateError type.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用WebEngineCertificateError类型的方法来处理证书错误。

trans-unit.source: The certificate error can be ignored by calling ignoreCertificateError, which will resume loading the request.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用ignoreCertificateError忽略证书错误，该错误将继续加载请求。

trans-unit.source: The certificate error is ignored, and the web engine view continues to load the requested URL.
trans-unit.target: 证书错误被忽略,网络引擎视图继续加载请求的URL。

trans-unit.source: The class allows both NDEF data and/or files to be shared between two devices by calling the setShareModes() method. This method specifies either an NDEF Data and/or a File transfer. The targetDetected() signal is emitted each time a share target is detected. A QNearFieldShareTarget pointer is passed with the signal, which can be used to share either an NDEF message or one or more files.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许通过调用setShareModes（）方法在两个设备之间共享NDEF数据和/或文件。此方法指定NDEF数据和/或文件传输。所述targetDetected每次检测到共享目标时间（）信号被发射。甲QNearFieldShareTarget指针传递与所述信号，其可以用来共享任一NDEF消息或一个或多个文件。

trans-unit.source: The class allows to access HTTP cookies of Chromium for a specific profile. It can be used to synchronize cookies of Chromium and the QNetworkAccessManager, as well as to set, delete, and intercept cookies during navigation. Because cookie operations are asynchronous, the user can choose to provide a callback function to get notified about the success of the operation. The signal handlers for removal and addition should not be used to execute heavy tasks, because they might block the IO thread in case of a blocking connection.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许访问特定配置文件的Chromium的HTTP cookie。它可用于同步Chromium和QNetworkAccessManager的 cookie，以及在导航期间设置，删除和拦截cookie。因为cookie操作是异步的，所以用户可以选择提供回调函数来获取有关操作成功的通知。用于删除和添加的信号处理程序不应用于执行繁重的任务，因为在连接阻塞的情况下它们可能会阻塞IO线程。

trans-unit.source: The class allows to store client certificates in an in-memory store. When a web site requests an SSL client certificate, the QWebEnginePage::selectClientCertificate signal is emitted with matching certificates from the native certificate store or the in-memory store. The getInstance() method can be used to access the single instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许将客户端证书存储在内存中。当网站请求SSL客户端证书时，将发出QWebEnginePage :: selectClientCertificate信号，并带有来自本机证书存储或内存中存储的匹配证书。getInstance（）方法可用于访问类的单个实例。

trans-unit.source: The class also provides a constructor for normal use and two public member functions that are used to obtain the private data.

trans-unit.source: The class also provides several constructors for other situations, including a constructor that accepts a QFile or any other QIODevice subclass that is used to write debugging information to files and other devices. The constructor that accepts a QString is used to write to a string for display or serialization.

trans-unit.source: The class is used as a helper to marshall types in QVariant and in queued signals and slots connections. It associates a type name to a type so that it can be created and destructed dynamically at run-time. Declare new types with Q_DECLARE_METATYPE() to make them available to QVariant and other template-based functions. Call qRegisterMetaType() to make types available to non-template based functions, such as the queued signal and slot connections.
trans-unit.target: 该类用作在QVariant中以及在排队的信号和插槽连接中编组类型的助手。它将类型名称与类型相关联，以便可以在运行时动态创建和销毁它。使用Q_DECLARE_METATYPE（）声明新类型，以使它们可用于QVariant和其他基于模板的函数。调用qRegisterMetaType（）使类型可用于非基于模板的功能，例如排队的信号和插槽连接。

trans-unit.source: The class is used as a helper to marshall types in QVariant and in queued signals and slots connections. It associates a type name to a type so that it can be created and destructed dynamically at run-time. Declare new types with Q_DECLARE_METATYPE() to make them available to QVariant and other template-based functions. Call qRegisterMetaType() to make types available to non-template based functions, such as the queued signal and slot connections.
trans-unit.target: 该类用作在QVariant中以及在排队的信号和插槽连接中编组类型的助手。它将类型名称与类型相关联，以便可以在运行时动态创建和销毁它。使用Q_DECLARE_METATYPE（）声明新类型，以使它们可用于QVariant和其他基于模板的函数。调用qRegisterMetaType（）使类型可用于非基于模板的功能，例如排队的信号和插槽连接。

trans-unit.source: The class is used to send arguments over D-Bus to remote applications and to receive them back. D-Bus offers an extensible type system, based on a few primitive types and associations of them. See the Qt D-Bus Type System page for more information on the type system.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于通过D-Bus将参数发送到远程应用程序并将其接收回来。D-Bus基于一些原始类型及其关联提供了可扩展的类型系统。有关类型系统的更多信息，请参见Qt D-Bus类型系统页面。

trans-unit.source: The class primarily provides an optimization for cases where the text, its font and the transformations on the painter are static over several paint events. If the text or its layout is changed for every iteration, QPainter::drawText() is the more efficient alternative, since the static text's layout would have to be recalculated to take the new state into consideration.
trans-unit.target: 该类主要针对在多个绘制事件上文本，其字体和绘制器上的转换为静态的情况提供优化。如果每次迭代都更改文本或其布局，则QPainter :: drawText（）是更有效的替代方法，因为必须重新计算静态文本的布局以考虑新的状态。

trans-unit.source: The class provides a quit() slot and an aboutToQuit() signal.

trans-unit.source: The class provides a number of primitive container operations, using void* as operands. This way, you can manipulate a generic container retrieved from a Variant without knowing its type.

trans-unit.source: The class supports the mapping of particular strings or integers with particular objects using setMapping(). trans-unit.source: The classes listed below automatically detach from common data if an object is about to be changed. The programmer will not even notice that the objects are shared. Thus you should treat separate instances of them as separate objects. They will always behave as separate objects but with the added benefit of sharing data whenever possible. For this reason, you can pass instances of these classes as arguments to functions by value without concern for the copying overhead.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个对象即将被改变,下面列出的类会自动从公共数据中分离出来。程序员甚至不会注意到这些对象是共享的。因此,你应该把它们的单独实例当作单独的对象。它们将始终表现为单独的对象,但有一个额外的好处,即尽可能共享数据。出于这个原因,你可以通过值将这些类的实例作为参数传递给函数,而不必担心复制的开销。

trans-unit.source: The classification functions include functions like those in the standard C++ header <cctype> (formerly <ctype.h>), but operating on the full range of Unicode characters, not just for the ASCII range. They all return true if the character is a certain type of character; otherwise they return false. These classification functions are isNull() (returns true if the character is '\0'), isPrint() (true if the character is any sort of printable character, including whitespace), isPunct() (any sort of punctation), isMark() (Unicode Mark), isLetter() (a letter), isNumber() (any sort of numeric character, not just 0-9), isLetterOrNumber(), and isDigit() (decimal digits). All of these are wrappers around category() which return the Unicode-defined category of each character. Some of these also calculate the derived properties (for example isSpace() returns true if the character is of category Separator_* or an exceptional code point from Other_Control category).
trans-unit.target: 分类功能包括与标准C ++头文件<cctype>（以前为<ctype.h>）中的功能相同的功能，但这些功能可在整个Unicode字符范围内运行，而不仅限于ASCII范围。如果字符是某种类型的字符，它们都将返回true；否则，它们都将返回true。否则，它们返回false。这些分类函数是isNull（）（如果字符为'\ 0'，则返回 true ），isPrint（）（如果字符是任何类型的可打印字符（包括空格），则为true），isPunct（）（任何类型的标点符号），isMark（）（Unicode标记），isLetter（）（一个字母），isNumber（）（任何数字字符，而不仅仅是0-9），isLetterOrNumber（）和isDigit（）（十进制数字）。所有这些都是类别（）的包装，它们返回每个字符的Unicode定义类别。其中一些还计算派生的属性（例如，如果字符属于Separator_ *类别或Other_Control类别中的特殊代码点，则isSpace（）返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: The code below searches for an item in the stack that has a name "order_id" and then unwinds to that item. Note that since find() returns null if no item is found, and since pop unwinds to the bottom of the stack if null is given as the target item, the code works well even in case no matching item is found.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码在堆栈中搜索名称为“ order_id”的项目，然后展开到该项目。请注意，由于如果未找到任何项目，则find（）返回 null ;如果如果将null作为目标项目，则pop展开到堆栈的底部，因此即使找不到匹配的项目，代码也可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The code inside the Worker's slot would then execute in a separate thread. However, you are free to connect the Worker's slots to any signal, from any object, in any thread. It is safe to connect signals and slots across different threads, thanks to a mechanism called queued connections.
trans-unit.target: 然后，Worker插槽中的代码将在单独的线程中执行。但是，您可以自由地将Worker的插槽连接到任何线程中来自任何对象的任何信号。借助称为排队连接的机制，可以安全地跨不同的线程连接信号和插槽。

trans-unit.source: The codec grew out of the QBig5Codec originally contributed by Ming-Che Chuang <mingche@cobra.ee.ntu.edu.tw>. James Su <suzhe@turbolinux.com.cn> <suzhe@gnuchina.org> and Anthony Fok <anthony@thizlinux.com> <foka@debian.org> implemented HKSCS-1999 QBig5hkscsCodec for Qt-2.3.x, but it was too late in Qt development schedule to be officially included in the Qt-2.3.x series.
trans-unit.target: 该编解码器源自最初由Ming-Che Chuang <mingche@cobra.ee.ntu.edu.tw>贡献的QBig5Codec。苏志安<suzhe@turbolinux.com.cn> <suzhe@gnuchina.org>和Anthony Fok <anthony@thizlinux.com> <foka@debian.org>为Qt-2.3.x实现了HKSCS-1999 QBig5hkscsCodec。在Qt开发计划中为时已晚，无法正式纳入Qt-2.3.x系列。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,颜色缓冲区被清除。

trans-unit.source: The color components can be retrieved individually, e.g with red(), hue() and cyan(). The values of the color components can also be retrieved in one go using the getRgb(), getHsv() and getCmyk() functions. Using the RGB color model, the color components can in addition be accessed with rgb().
trans-unit.target: 可以分别检索颜色分量，例如使用红色（），色相（）和青色（）。还可以使用getRgb（），getHsv（）和getCmyk（）函数一次性检索颜色分量的值。使用RGB颜色模型，还可以使用rgb（）访问颜色分量。

trans-unit.source: The color components can be retrieved individually, e.g with red(), hue() and cyan(). The values of the color components can also be retrieved in one go using the getRgb(), getHsv() and getCmyk() functions. Using the RGB color model, the color components can in addition be accessed with rgb().
trans-unit.target: 可以分别检索颜色成分，例如使用红色（），色相（）和青色（）。还可以使用getRgb（），getHsv（）和getCmyk（）函数一次性检索颜色分量的值。使用RGB颜色模型，还可以使用rgb（）访问颜色分量。

trans-unit.source: The color dialog's function is to allow users to choose colors. For example, you might use this in a drawing program to allow the user to set the brush color.
trans-unit.target: 颜色对话框的功能是让用户选择颜色。例如,你可以在绘图程序中使用这个功能,让用户设置画笔的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color for the label background, if enabled. Defaults to "gray".
trans-unit.target: 标签背景的颜色（如果启用）。默认为 "gray" 。

trans-unit.source: The color for the label text. Also affects label border, if enabled. Defaults to "white".
trans-unit.target: 标签文字的颜色。如果启用，也会影响标签边框。默认为 "white" 。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 11-bit integer in R and G channels and 10-bit integer in B channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R和G通道中考虑为11位整数,在B通道中考虑为10位整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 16-bit depth map.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式被认为是16位深度图。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 16-bit float in R and G channels.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R和G通道中被认为是16位浮点数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 16-bit float in R channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R通道中被认为是16位浮动。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 16-bit float in R,G,B and alpha channels.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R,G,B和alpha通道中被认为是16位浮动。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 16-bit integer in R channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R通道中被认为是16位整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 16-bit luminance map.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式被认为是16位亮度图。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 24-bit depth and 8-bit stencil map.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式考虑为24位深度和8位模板图。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 24-bit depth map.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式被认为是24位深度图。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 32-bit depth map.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式被认为是32位深度图。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 32-bit float R channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式被认为是32位浮动R通道。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 32-bit float in R and G channels.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R和G通道中被认为是32位浮动。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 32-bit float in R, G and B channels.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R、G、B通道中被认为是32位浮动。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 32-bit float in R, G, B and alpha channels.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R、G、B和alpha通道中被认为是32位浮动。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 32-bit integer in R channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R通道中被认为是32位整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 32-bit unsigned integer in R channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R通道中被认为是32位无符号整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 5-bit integer in R and B channels and 6-bit integer in G channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R、B通道中考虑为5位整数,在G通道中考虑为6位整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 5-bit integer in R, G, B channels and boolean alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R、G、B通道和布尔阿尔法通道中被认为是5位整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 8-bit alpha map.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式被认为是8位阿尔法图。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 8-bit integer in R and G channels.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R和G通道中被认为是8位整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 8-bit integer in R channel.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R通道中被认为是8位整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 8-bit integer in R, G and B channels in standard RGB color space.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式被认为是标准RGB颜色空间中R、G、B通道的8位整数。

trans-unit.source: The color format is considered as 8-bit integer in R, G and B channels.
trans-unit.target: 颜色格式在R、G、B通道中被认为是8位整数。
